name: Candle Keeper
description:
Follow the story of the candle keeper, a gentle problem solver of a petrified forest that is threatened by an encroaching darkness. Light candles to keep the creature causing the darkness at bay, and find out the secrets and stories the forest has to offer!

Candle Keeper is a University of Wisconsin- Stout student made game, about 3 months of work made by our group Cryptid Cult.  It was designed for use on a tablet, so as of December 11, 2019 it is a file download (APK) for Android devices. But it will be soon released as a PC Unity build!

CONTROLS
